About IT
================================================================================

Scraped from: https://it.vanderbilt.edu/home/
Date scraped: 2025-02-17 02:45:08

Vanderbilt IT A new and enhanced help desk system that will offer improved functionality for our campus community has arrived that includes Oracle/SkyVU support. Visit the service portal for a short video and how to resources to get started. Looking for time reporting/Kronos(UKG)? Login to Kronos Password Reset? Storage Retention FAQ DUO Support? Report a Phishing Incident. Need Vanderbilt Wifi? VU Identity VU Software Store View All Resources Just For You Students Researchers Faculty & Staff Need help? Report a Security Incident Report Phishing  On-Campus Support is provided by request : Monday - Friday: 7:00 AM – 6:00 PM Walk-up Support is provided at the Hill Center: Monday - Friday: 9:00 AM - 3:00 PM Phone Support can be reached at 615-343-9999 or by texting us at 1-844-436-1567 : Monday - Thursday: 7:00 AM – 11:00 PM Friday: 7:00 AM - 6:00 PM Saturday: Closed Sunday: 2:00 PM– 11:00 PM News and Events 
================================================================================

Date scraped: 2025-02-17 02:45:14

Students Before You Arrive Authorize VUnetID DUO Authentication Get Connected Via Vu Email Vanderbilt Wi-Fi While You Are Here Change Password Duo FAQ vpn access Software Store Classroom Resources Brightspace Zoom YES Library More Information for Students Devices Faculty, staff, and students should use vuDevices for gaming systems, smart devices, AppleTVs, or Roku devices (ChromeCast devices are not supported). Users should register the device by going to Vanderbilt WiFi and selecting ‘I have a VUnetID’ then connect gaming console. Please note this can only be done on campus. For more information, visit vuDevices . Online Tools and Services There are several online tools available to the Vanderbilt community. For more information, visit the Vanderbilt Software Store and the Communications and Collaboration page. More FAQs Still have a question? Submit a help request My help tickets
